answers.answer: HII think it mean your pancreas in not produceing the right amount of insulin and this is what the pills are for.  I would say you should get this tested for it could cause diabetes.Don't let this alarm you, there are a lot of help out there for this and it may be nothing.  But still I would gets all the tests I could to rule out anything.Note: I would research this on google to try and fine out all the info you can before you see your doctor this way you can rule out stuff before hand.

question: Someone please help, I am being told that I have an under active pancreas. I am suppose to go on pills but I am having a hard time finding information on this, even from my doctor. Does anyone know anything about a pancreas being under active.
title: Under Active Pancreas
